alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 2:12AM MST until January 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. A light glaze of ice on elevated and exposed surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Occasional light freezing drizzle also possible.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
